plugins.bluetoothAlwaysPermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to connect to bluetooth devices

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow this app to access location even when closed or not in use.
plugins.locationAlwaysPermission: Allow this app to always access location.
plugins.locationWhenInUsePermission: Allow this app to access location only while using the app.

infoPlist.NSBluetoothAlwaysUsageDescription: This app uses Bluetooth to connect to devices.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: This app requires access to your location for scanning Wi-Fi networks.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app requires access to your location when the app is in use.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app requires camera access to scan barcodes.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This app requires microphone access to record audio.
